name: Manic Miner: Jet Set Willy
overview: From the people that attempted to turn Manic MIner's flip-screen rooms into a Jet Set Willy style mansion comes this follow-up: an attempt to turn the Jet Set Willy mansion into individual Manic Miner style rooms! Confused? You will be... Some of the more memorable rooms in Willy's mansion have been re-built and re-imagined in a Manic Miner editor to breathe new life and challenge into familiar surroundings.
